title: Terrell Owens Weighs in on Championship Sunday
itunes:title: Terrell Owens Weighs in on Championship Sunday
description:
Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu, and Mike Lynch catch up with NFL Hall of Famer Terrell Owens. They reflect on his storied career in the league, get his take on the Conference Championship matchups, and discuss his new business venture with social media platform, TruSo. All that and more on this weekend edition of Bloomberg Business of Sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
